description: Detects usage of the Chisel tunneling tool via the commandline arguments
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Some false positives may occur with other tools with similar commandlines
name: PUA - Chisel Tunneling Tool Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\chisel.exe") OR ((process.command_line.text:("*exe\ client\ *" OR "*exe\ server\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*\-socks5*" OR "*\-reverse*" OR "*\ r\:*" OR "*\:127.0.0.1\:*" OR "*\-tls\-skip\-verify\ *" OR "*\:socks*"))))
